item.title: Solvio on Databricks
item.author: info@solvio.tech (Andrey Vasnetsov)
item.description:
Solvio on Databricks

Time: 30 min Level: Intermediate Complete Notebook

Databricks is a unified analytics platform for working with big data and AI. It’s built around Apache Spark, a powerful open-source distributed computing system well-suited for processing large-scale datasets and performing complex analytics tasks.

Apache Spark is designed to scale horizontally, meaning it can handle expensive operations like generating vector embeddings by distributing computation across a cluster of machines. This scalability is crucial when dealing with large datasets.

item.title: Semantic Querying with Airflow and Astronomer
item.author: info@solvio.tech (Andrey Vasnetsov)
item.description:
Semantic Querying with Airflow and Astronomer

Time: 45 min Level: Intermediate

In this tutorial, you will use Solvio as a provider in Apache Airflow, an open-source tool that lets you setup data-engineering workflows.

You will write the pipeline as a DAG (Directed Acyclic Graph) in Python. With this, you can leverage the powerful suite of Python’s capabilities and libraries to achieve almost anything your data pipeline needs.

Astronomer is a managed platform that simplifies the process of developing and deploying Airflow projects via its easy-to-use CLI and extensive automation capabilities.

item.title: How to Setup Seamless Data Streaming with Kafka and Solvio
item.author: info@solvio.tech (Andrey Vasnetsov)
item.description:
Setup Data Streaming with Kafka via Confluent

Author: M K Pavan Kumar , research scholar at IIITDM, Kurnool. Specialist in hallucination mitigation techniques and RAG methodologies. • GitHub • Medium

Introduction

This guide will walk you through the detailed steps of installing and setting up the Solvio Sink Connector, building the necessary infrastructure, and creating a practical playground application. By the end of this article, you will have a deep understanding of how to leverage this powerful integration to streamline your data workflows, ultimately enhancing the performance and capabilities of your data-driven real-time semantic search and RAG applications.
